title: AI Use Case Prioritization Tool
description: Interactive 2x2 matrix visualization for prioritizing AI initiatives based on business value and implementation complexity with draggable bubbles and real-time ranking
creator: Claude Code
subject: AI Strategy
Prioritization
Business Value
Portfolio Management
learningObjectives: Evaluate and prioritize AI opportunities using structured criteria
Analyze trade-offs between business value and implementation complexity
Apply prioritization frameworks to industry-specific scenarios

controls.name: Clear All
controls.description: Remove all use cases from the matrix

controls.name: Bubble Drag
controls.description: Drag bubbles to reposition use cases and explore what-if scenarios

assumptions: Value and complexity can be quantified on 1-10 scales
Priority score formula weights value higher than complexity
limitations: Does not account for dependencies between use cases
